children.value: If you've had the pleasure of trying to stumble your way through learning React, you'll have been through the adjustment phase with JSX. Putting HTML and JS side-by-side feels like it's violating the internet rules at first. It's just a new mashup - an awkward lovechild.

<BasicImage alt="JSX is like the lovechild of HTML and JS. It mixes the best of both worlds" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/dg3gyk0gu/image/upload/c_scale,w_900/v1592262858/maggieappleton.com/egghead-course-notes/JSX_Final_2x.png" />
